message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.AL, cs.NE, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with algorithms for distributed computing, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The specific focus on local centralized and local distributed algorithms suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of Distributed Algorithms (cs.DS). The use of vertex coloring and matching algorithms suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of Algorithms (cs.AL). The mention of approximation schemes suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of Network Economics (cs.NE). Finally, the use of recursive techniques suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of Game Theory and Decision Science (cs.GT).
